instruction: Generate a jingle of length 8 lines, with each line 4 syllables, for a new type of soft drink.
output:
Sip this treat with glee,
Cool refreshment all agree;
Citrus Splash, your new best friend,
Delightful taste to the end!

What a perfect summer ‘potion,
A perfect thirst quencher lotion;
Lively flavor, flavor bright,
A beverage sure to delight!
